name: Monkey Mike's
description:
Monkey Mike and T-Bone don't like each other very  much, and they always seem to change colors for no reason.

Figure out what to do in each mini-game based on each monkey's color.

Made for MiniJam 62.

Freakin.

Controls:

Player 1 - A, D, W, S, Spacebar

Player 2 - Left, Right, Up, Down, Ctrl
